Temperature Control: Adding a touch screen display with adjustable temperature settings and air quality control can help better manage and maintain food safety inside the fridge.
Smart Features: Adding sensors that automatically detect and maintain ideal temperatures and energy-efficient algorithms can help save energy while still providing optimal cooling.
Organizational Tools: Including built-in shelves, adjustable compartments, and pull-out drawers can improve organization and increase accessibility for efficient use of space inside the refrigerator.
Automated Cleaning: Introducing a built-in built-in self-cleaning feature can improve hygiene, making it easier to maintain a clean and sanitary kitchen environment.

Magnetic Organization: Adding a magnetic surface to the refrigerator door and inside shelves that can hold notes, papers, and small drawings can offer functional and decorative organization and display options.
